forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East northeast wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a canopy of striking clarity, punctuated by the mellow embrace of the sun. The temperature hovers near the low sixties, a comfortable warmth tempered by a gentle breeze whispering from the northeast. As the day drifts toward evening, the air will cool slightly, settling back into the forties, where it will linger throughout the night, rising just enough to stir a fresh sense of calm. The skies remain unblemished, dissolving any remnants of fog or marine layer that often drape the city.

This splendid weather invites a leisurely exploration. Dressed in layers, one might appreciate the crispness of the season while strolling the waterfront or meandering through the vibrant streets, where the hustle and bustle harmonize with a sense of community. Perhaps an afternoon coffee at a tucked-away café, followed by an easy walk along one of the historic piers, will offer the perfect blend of relaxation and engagement. As twilight descends, with stars beginning to dot the sky, the cool air becomes a gentle companion, echoing the serene beauty of this remarkable city.
